programme.title: Phantasm 5: Ravager
programme.desc: Reggie wanders through the desert, but suddenly awakes in a different dimension.

programme.title: Summer of 84
programme.desc: Teenager Davey Armstrong is a conspiracy theorist who begins to suspect that a neighbouring police officer is a serial killer.

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Trish's slumber party for her basketball teammates includes an unexpected guest.

programme.title: Amityville: It's About Time
programme.desc: A widowed father brings an evil antique clock home from a business trip for his teenage kids.

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

programme.title: Black Christmas
programme.desc: During their Christmas break, a group of sorority girls are stalked by a stranger.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama, the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: A biological experiment goes haywire when meat-eating mutant roaches invade an island community.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: Christie's nightmares grow worse after her father drowns, revealing a sinister truth tied to the mortuary.

programme.title: The Convent
programme.desc: A group of college students breaks into an abandoned convent, only to discover that it's inhabited by demons.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Dog Soldiers
programme.desc: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.

programme.title: Eat Brains Love
programme.desc: When Jake and his dream girl, Amanda, contract a mysterious zombie virus, they end up on the run from Cass, a teen psychic sent by the government's top-secret Necrotic Control Division to track them down as they search for a cure.

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.
